title: The Goodbye Cat
name: Kota Sakuraba
reason to be rescued: abandoned twenty years ago during the rainy season as a kitten
meaning of name: intended name of second son, Hiromi.
family type: husband and wife with two sons

title: The Goodbye Cat
name: Diana  Sakuraba
reason to be rescued: pet shop was going to rid of her due to an abnormality in her iris
meaning of name: a character in Anne of the Green Gables -- a book that Akemi favours.
family type: husband and wife with two sons

title: Bringing up Baby
name: Spin Tsukuda
reason to be rescued: three weeks before the start of the story, as a kitten that was thrown in a rubbish recycling point along with its deceased sibling.
meaning of name: Cat played with a bookmark (shiori) by making it spin.
family type: husband and wife with infant daughter

title: Good Father / Bad Father
name: Tora
reason to be rescued: Not rescued, but procured under Free Giveaways in a newspaper.
died of: old age (died in Mom's hands wearing diapers)

title: Good Father / Bad Father
breed: Light tortoise shell with patches of cream
name: Ten
reason to be rescued: Found as a kitten in a grove beside a road.
meaning of name: Japanese word for heaven or sky.

title: Cat Island
breed: Black tabby with a white eye that is clouded over.
name: N/A
reason to be rescued: A cat was found floundering in the waves.
rescued by: Dad / Mr. Sakamoto and Haruko Sakamoto
family type: husband and stepmother with a son

title: Finding Hachi / The Travelling Cat Chronicles
breed: White dawny fur with a black hooked tail.
name: Hachi
reason to be rescued: Rescued as a kitten when left abandoned in a box. Later adopted by the former owner's family after an accident that killed his parents.
rescued by: Two boys called Satoru and Kosuke.
meaning of name: A marking on the cat's forehead that looks like the Japanese word for eight, but also a signifier of good fortune, as eight is a lucky number.
lived for: 4 to 5 years based on Satoru's age.
family type: Husband and wife with a son. Later, husband and wife with a girl and two boys.

title: Life Is Not Always Kind / The Travelling Cat Chronicles
breed: White tabby cat with spots of colour on face and a bent tail.
name: Nana
reason to be rescued: Rescued by Satoru after an injury (got hit by a car)
meaning of name: Hooked tail that looks like the Japanese number seven from above.

title: The Unsentimental Farmer / The Travelling Cat Chronicles
name: Chatran
reason to be rescued: Rescued by Daigo who found him lying on the road.
meaning of name: Based on a film called The Adventures of Chatran (who is a red tabby)

meaning of name: Named peach, which is the fruit that the couple owning a B&B grow on their orchard.
